name: Wrist Stretch Reminder
desc: You remember to stretch once per day. Once.

name: Slightly Less Terrible Mouse
desc: It barely double-clicks on its own now.

name: Ergonomic Mousepad
desc: Gel wrist support: for when you're 25 but feel 65.

name: Better Desk Chair Cushion
desc: Your back stops screaming long enough to click slightly harder.

name: Extra-Loud Mechanical Keyboard
desc: MX Blues. Everyone hates you, but wow are they clicky.

name: Password Resetifier 3000
desc: Your new auto-responder can help solve easy miscellaneous tickets.

name: Link Scraper
desc: Your new auto-responder can help resolve easy web tickets.

name: Reboot Robot
desc: Your new auto-responder can help resolve easy Windows tickets.

name: Sudo Sidekick
desc: Your new auto-responder can help resolve easy Linux tickets.

name: WiFi Wrangler
desc: Your new auto-responder can help resolve easy network tickets.

name: Network Pro Resolver
desc: Your new script can help automatically fininsh medium network tickets.

name: Annual Performance Review
desc: Management discovers you're the only one answering tickets. You get a tiny raise.

name: Quarterly Bonus (Somehow)
desc: No one knows why you qualified, including you. But hey, it's money.

name: Online Training Course
desc: You click through 48 slides of corporate nonsense. You still learn something.

name: Pretend Team Lead Duties
desc: They give you responsibilities but not the title. Classic move.

name: Improved Ticket Tagging Habits
desc: You stop marking everything as 'High Priority'. Miraculously, your workflow improves.

name: Certification in Something
desc: You're not sure what it certifies, but recruiters seem impressed.
